article_title: #Newsfail Authors Play Word Association With The Mainstream Media
article_text:
Everyone loves a game of word association, especially when it comes to the people we love to talk about the most — the people talking to us on TV.

The authors of #Newsfail -- comedian Jamie Kilstein and journalist Allison Kilkenny -- stopped by HuffPost Live on Friday to promote their new book and, during the course of the conversation, host Alyona Minkovski challenged the duo to pair a word to a picture of a TV news personality.

Catch the full HuffPost Live conversation here.

Sign up here for Live Today, HuffPost Live's new morning email that will let you know the newsmakers, celebrities and politicians joining us that day and give you the best clips from the day before!



Also on HuffPost: Fox News FAILS Fox News FAILS

1 of 13 A Common Misconception "Up next, the tragic story of a cat who just wants a cheeseburger, but is denied by Obamacare." Via Reddit Share this slide:
